summary: This document contains alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding the Caterpillar Trust and its associated entities, highlighting various legal and regulatory issues faced by Caterpillar Inc. The document outlines multiple incidents of fraud, environmental violations, and tax-related offenses, indicating a pattern of misconduct over several years. This document contains monitoring alerts related to the 2017 Caterpillar Trust, highlighting various media articles and reports concerning Caterpillar Inc. and its legal and financial issues. It includes references to investigations, lawsuits, and penalties associated with the company, particularly regarding tax and environmental violations.

events.title: Caterpillar Fraud Charges
events.description: Caterpillar was charged with fraud after discovering accounting misconduct at its subsidiary, ERA Mining Machinery.

events.title: Environmental Offense Plea
events.description: United Industries LLC, a subsidiary of Caterpillar, pleaded guilty to a federal environmental offense and was fined $5 million.

events.title: Search Warrant Execution
events.description: Caterpillar locations were searched in connection with a possible tax matter involving its subsidiary.

events.title: IRS Raid
events.description: Agents from the IRS raided Caterpillar's headquarters as part of an investigation into tax and accounting fraud.

events.title: Class Action Lawsuit
events.description: Caterpillar Inc. was named in a class action lawsuit for allegedly using foreign subsidiaries to avoid paying U.S. taxes.
